SEARCH
Package edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.service

Class GameService

java.lang.Object
edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.service.GameService
All Implemented Interfaces:
AbstractGameService
@Service public class GameService extends Object implements AbstractGameService
This class is where the methods with all the operational and transactional elements live. GameService implements AbstractGameService and its methods. The GameController invokes the overridden methods here.

  • Method Details

    • startJoinGame

      public GameDTO startJoinGame(Game game, User user)
      THis method performs three functions: Start a game that doesn't exist yet, join a game that has already started, and rejoin a game that has started. The method checks if the user is already in a game and forces the user to finish any game they have started.
      Specified by:
      startJoinGame in interface AbstractGameService
      Parameters:
      game - GameService for a specific game.
      user - User for the specified user starting or joining a game.
      Returns:
